TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TaskCommandLineEventArgs extends Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildMessageEventArgs

summary.span: 任务使用此类记录其命令行。

span.span: This class is used by tasks to log their command lines.

summary.span: 此类扩展 ，以便可将命令行记录为消息。

span.span: This class extends so that command lines can be logged as messages.

summary.span: 记录命令行仅与包装基础可执行文件/工具或模拟 shell 命令的任务有关。

span.span: Logging a command line is only relevant for tasks that wrap an underlying executable/tool, or emulate a shell command.

summary.span: 没有等效命令行的任务不应引发此扩展消息事件。

span.span: Tasks that have no command line equivalent should not raise this extended message event.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: commandLine

span.span: The command line used by a task to launch its underlying tool/executable.

span.span: Importance of command line -- controls whether the command line will be displayed by less verbose loggers.
